keyMoments.title: Caesar Reveals Punk Hazard's Destruction
keyMoments.description: Caesar narrates how he destroyed Punk Hazard four years ago with the H2S gas bomb, establishing the origins of his weapon demonstration.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Caesar's past crimes and establishes him as a mass murderer willing to kill for scientific advancement.
keyMoments.quote: Four years ago, I killed this island with the H2S bomb!

keyMoments.title: Shinokuni Weapon Unveiled
keyMoments.description: Caesar celebrates the successful transformation of Smiley into Shinokuni, his ultimate weapon of mass destruction.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full extent of Caesar's cruelty and scientific capabilities, creating one of the deadliest weapons in the series.
keyMoments.quote: Before, my gas weapon could only paralyze the victim but left them alive. However, I created a new type of gas that turns the victim's body to ash and paralyzes them completely!

abilities.description: Caesar demonstrates his ability to create the deadly Shinokuni weapon by transforming Smiley into a petrifying gas.

relationships.description: Caesar created Smiley and uses it as a tool for his weapon demonstration, ultimately sacrificing it to create Shinokuni.

evolutionMoments.description: Caesar feeds Smiley poisoned candy, killing it to create the Shinokuni weapon.

reveals.information: Caesar killed Punk Hazard four years ago using H2S gas bomb
Created Shinokuni, an improved version of his gas weapon that petrifies victims

keyMoments.title: Smiley Disobeys and Eats the Candy
keyMoments.description: Smiley eagerly consumes the poisoned candy despite Caesar's instruction to wait, triggering its transformation into Shinokuni.
keyMoments.significance: This moment of disobedience triggers Smiley's death and the creation of the Shinokuni weapon.

keyMoments.title: Death of Smiley
keyMoments.description: Smiley dissolves completely after consuming the poisoned candy, letting out a final roar before its body breaks down into gas.
keyMoments.significance: Smiley's death creates the Shinokuni weapon and demonstrates the first on-screen Devil Fruit reincarnation.

statusHistory.causeOfDeath: Poisoned by Caesar Clown's candy to create Shinokuni weapon

relationships.description: Smiley served Caesar Clown loyally until being sacrificed to create the Shinokuni weapon.

evolutionMoments.description: Caesar betrays Smiley by feeding it poisoned candy, killing it.

reveals.information: Smiley dies by consuming poisoned candy, transforming into Shinokuni gas

keyMoments.title: Luffy Declares Readiness for Counterattack
keyMoments.description: After all allies reach safety in the laboratory, Luffy confirms everyone is present and declares they are ready to begin their counterattack against Caesar.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the transition from defensive escape to offensive action against Caesar Clown.
keyMoments.quote: Everyone is here! Let's begin the counterattack!

keyMoments.title: Zoro and Kin'emon Cut Through Iron Shutters
keyMoments.description: Zoro works together with Kin'emon to slice through the heavy iron shutters blocking their entrance to the laboratory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's swordsmanship prowess and ability to work effectively with other swordsmen.

keyMoments.title: Kin'emon and Zoro Cut Through Iron Shutters
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon demonstrates his swordsmanship by working with Zoro to cut through the iron shutters.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kin'emon's combat abilities and his growing cooperation with the Straw Hat crew.
